briefdescription.para: Draw shadow below all text components.
Draw shadow under text.
Draw shadow under buffer.
Draw shadow under background shape.
Placement positions for text shadow.
Copy constructor.
Returns the blending mode used for drawing the drop shadow.
Returns whether only the alpha channel for the shadow will be blurred.
Returns the blur radius for the shadow.

detaileddescription.para:
Radius units are retrieved via blurRadiusUnits().
setBlurRadius()
blurRadiusUnit()

briefdescription.para: Returns the map unit scale object for the shadow blur radius.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used if the blurRadiusUnit() is set to QgsUnitTypes::RenderMapUnit.
setBlurRadiusMapUnitScale()
blurRadiusUnit()

briefdescription.para: Returns the units used for the shadow's blur radius.
Returns the color of the drop shadow.
Returns whether the shadow is enabled.
Returns the angle for offsetting the position of the shadow from the text.
Returns the distance for offsetting the position of the shadow from the text.

detaileddescription.para:
Offset units are retrieved via offsetUnit().
setOffsetDistance()
offsetUnit()

briefdescription.para: Returns true if the global shadow offset will be used.
Returns the map unit scale object for the shadow offset distance.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used if the offsetUnit() is set to QgsUnitTypes::RenderMapUnit.
setOffsetMapUnitScale()
offsetUnit()

briefdescription.para: Returns the units used for the shadow's offset.
Returns the shadow's opacity.

detaileddescription.para:
The opacity is a double value between 0 (fully transparent) and 1 (totally opaque).
setOpacity()

briefdescription.para: Reads settings from a layer's custom properties (for QGIS 2.x projects).
Read settings from a DOM element.
Returns the scaling used for the drop shadow (in percentage of original size).
Sets the blending mode used for drawing the drop shadow.
Sets whether only the alpha channel for the shadow should be blurred.

parameterdescription.para: set to true to blur only the alpha channel. If false, all channels (including red, green and blue channel) will be blurred.

briefdescription.para: Sets the blur radius for the shadow.

detaileddescription.para:
Radius units are specified via setBlurRadiusUnits().
blurRadius
blur radius
blurRadius()
setBlurRadiusUnit()

briefdescription.para: Sets the map unit scale object for the shadow blur radius.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used if the blurRadiusUnit() is set to QgsUnitTypes::RenderMapUnit.
scale
scale for shadow blur radius
blurRadiusMapUnitScale()
setBlurRadiusUnit()

briefdescription.para: Sets the units used for the shadow's blur radius.
Sets the color for the drop shadow.
Sets whether the text shadow will be drawn.

parameterdescription.para: set to true to draw shadow

briefdescription.para: Sets the angle for offsetting the position of the shadow from the text.
Sets the distance for offsetting the position of the shadow from the text.

detaileddescription.para:
Offset units are specified via setOffsetUnit().
distance
offset distance
offsetDistance()
setOffsetUnit()

briefdescription.para: Sets whether the global shadow offset should be used.

parameterdescription.para: set to true to use global shadow offset.

briefdescription.para: Sets the map unit scale object for the shadow offset distance.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used if the offsetUnit() is set to QgsUnitTypes::RenderMapUnit.
scale
scale for shadow offset
offsetMapUnitScale()
setOffsetUnit()

briefdescription.para: Sets the units used for the shadow's offset.
Sets the shadow's opacity.

parameterdescription.para: opacity as a double value between 0 (fully transparent) and 1 (totally opaque)

briefdescription.para: Sets the scaling used for the drop shadow (in percentage of original size).
Sets the placement for the drop shadow.

detaileddescription.para:
The placement determines both the z-order stacking position for the shadow and the what shape (e.g., text, background shape) is used for casting the shadow.
placement
shadow placement
shadowPlacement()

briefdescription.para: Returns the placement for the drop shadow.

detaileddescription.para:
The placement determines both the z-order stacking position for the shadow and the what shape (e.g., text, background shape) is used for casting the shadow.
setShadowPlacement()

briefdescription.para: Write settings into a DOM element.
Container for settings relating to a text shadow.
